Typography

<h1> Page Title

<h2> Section Title

<h3> Form Title / Workflow Title

<h4> Sidebar / Topbar Title

<h5> Subsection / Page Text

<p> Page Text

<h6> Small Text / Fine Print
<small> Small Text

<mark> You can use the mark tag to highlight text.

<strong> The following text will be rendered as bold text.

<em> The following text will be rendered as italics text.

<span class=label> Title with label New

Todo: Tables

Actionbar

The Actionbar contains the main action of the page. On short pages (ones without scroll bars) it will display directly below the form. However on a longer page, the actionbar will stick to the bottom of the browser window.

I am the inline actionbar
